title: Nth Term AP

explanation.approach: Use formula: nth term = first term + (n-1) × common difference
explanation.analogy: Like climbing stairs with equal steps - each step adds the same height.

title: Nth Term GP

explanation.approach: Multiply first term by ratio (n-1) times.
explanation.analogy: Like doubling money n times - it grows by multiplication.

title: Power Function

explanation.approach: Multiply x by itself n times.
explanation.analogy: 2^10 means multiply 2 ten times: 2×2×2×2×2×2×2×2×2×2 = 1024

title: Cube of Number

explanation.approach: Simply multiply n by itself 3 times.
explanation.analogy: Like the volume of a cube with side n.

title: Square Root Integer

explanation.approach: Find largest i where i² ≤ n.
explanation.analogy: What's the biggest number that when squared is still ≤ n?

title: Calculate Percentage

explanation.analogy: If you got 45 out of 50, that's 90%.

title: Simple Interest

explanation.analogy: Simple interest is like flat rent on your money.

title: Celsius to Fahrenheit

explanation.analogy: 0°C = 32°F (freezing point), 100°C = 212°F (boiling)

title: Fahrenheit to Celsius

explanation.analogy: Reverse of Celsius to Fahrenheit.

title: Area of Circle

explanation.analogy: How much space is inside a circle.

title: Area of Triangle

explanation.analogy: A triangle is half of a rectangle.

title: Area of Rectangle

explanation.analogy: Count tiles in a l×w grid.

title: Perimeter of Rectangle

explanation.analogy: Walk around the rectangle - two lengths and two widths.

title: Check Vowel

explanation.approach: Check if character is a, e, i, o, or u.
explanation.analogy: Vowels are the singing letters - A E I O U.

title: Check Consonant

explanation.approach: Is a letter but NOT a vowel.
explanation.analogy: Consonants are all letters except A E I O U.
steps: Check if it's not a vowel

title: Check Uppercase

explanation.approach: Check if between 'A' and 'Z' in ASCII.
explanation.analogy: Capital letters live between A(65) and Z(90) in ASCII.

title: Check Lowercase

explanation.analogy: Lowercase letters are a(97) to z(122).

title: Check Alphabet

explanation.analogy: Is it any letter from A-Z?

title: Check Digit

explanation.analogy: Digits are characters 0-9.

title: ASCII Value

explanation.approach: Cast char to int to get ASCII value.
explanation.analogy: Each character has a number code. A=65, a=97, 0=48.

title: Character from ASCII

explanation.analogy: Convert number back to its character. 65 → 'A'.

title: Toggle Case

explanation.approach: Lowercase and uppercase differ by 32 in ASCII.
explanation.analogy: 'a'(97) - 32 = 'A'(65). Add/subtract 32 to toggle.

title: Days in Month

explanation.approach: Use array for days. Check leap year for February.
explanation.analogy: 30 days has September, April, June, November...

title: Check Leap Year

explanation.approach: Divisible by 4 but not 100, OR divisible by 400.
steps: Check if divisible by 4 but not 100

title: Sum 1 to N Formula
